item.description:
@keep_on_runnin wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest is te best”]post on question [center] [size=15pt]This is a lock request[/size] [/center]

THIS IS A REQUEST I AM NOT BEING A MOd wanabe IM JUST TRYING TO HELP

This topic has been lock requested for breaking forum rules.

To make sure that your topics will not be locked in the future, please do the following:

[ul][li]Read the Moparisthebest.com Rules - This must be followed when posting anywhere in both of the forums.[/li]

[li]Read the RS2 Server Development/Help Rules - This must be followed when posting in the RS2 Server Development/Help forum.[/li]

[li]Read the RS2 Server Download Rules - This must be followed when posting in the RS2 Server Download forum.[/li]

[li]Read the RS2 Server Advertisement Rules - This must be followed when posting in the Server Advertisment forum.[/li]

[li]Read the RS2 Server Tutorial Rules - This must be followed when posting in the RS2 Server Tutorial forum.[/li]

[li]Read the Aryan Private Server Scripts Rules - This must be followed when posting in the Aryan Private Server Scripts forum.[/li]

[li]Read the RS Private Server Client Hacking Rules - This must be followed when posting in the Private Server Client Hacking forum.[/li]

[li]Read the MoparScape Questions Guide before posting any questions - Many frequently asked questions have already been answered.[/li][/ul]

Also, please remember not to:

[ul][li]Bump posts[/li]
[li]Spam[/li]
[li]Create multiple topics[/li]
[li]Post in wrong forums[/li][/ul]

Breaking any of these rules will not only annoy Moderators, but other members. There is a high possibility that your topic will become locked.[/quote]

trying to help my arse i just helped this dude and u come up with this boffin shit?

item.title: How i change max lvl to 99?
item.dc:creator: @keep_on_runnin keep on runnin
item.description:
@keep_on_runnin wrote:

thier was a tut on this but i guess u can have my it from me go in your player.java and search for [code]int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.3));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.3));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.3) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}

            combat = combatLevel;
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d
		str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
		str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
	}

[/code]
then replace that with mine[code]/*int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d

	str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
	str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
}*/[/code]

hope i helped!
